svg_role_g_path:
Issue: The <svg> element has a role of "img" but does not have an accessible text.

Corrected code snippet: <svg role="img" aria-label="Description of the image"><g><path></path></g></svg> 

Explanation: The aria-label attribute is added to provide a concise description of the image for screen readers and other assistive technologies. This ensures that the content is accessible to all users, including those with disabilities.
svg_role:
Issue: The <svg> element has a role of "img" but does not have an accessible text.

Corrected code snippet: <svg role="img" aria-label="Description of the image">
